answers.answer: First thing to do is to get his swimmers checked.After that, you should see your doctor to have yourself checked to make sure you are ovualting, etc.Good luck!

question: Himy partner  is 35 years old and i am 39 year old and already have 4 children, not by him. he has diabetes 2 and i was wondering if I can get pregnancy?  We have been trying and nothings happen. could it be me or him?
title: can i?
